description: The Judicial Island of the World Government, also known as the island that never sleeps due to its perpetual daylight. A fortress with multiple gates defended by giants and thousands of Marines.

keyEvents.title: Baskerville Coordinates Defense
keyEvents.description: Baskerville, as Chief Justice, coordinates the defense of Enies Lobby from his command post.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the organizational structure of Enies Lobby's defenses.

keyEvents.title: Yokozuna Bends the Gates
keyEvents.description: Yokozuna bends the outer fence of Enies Lobby inward to create a ramp for the Rocketman.
keyEvents.significance: A dramatic moment that showcases the rescue party's determination to breach the fortress.

keyEvents.title: The Rocketman Flies Over Gates
keyEvents.description: The Rocketman train soars through the air, flying over the first and second gates of Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: Iconic visual moment representing the unstoppable momentum of the rescue mission.

keyEvents.title: Oimo Knocked Out
keyEvents.description: One of the giant guards protecting Enies Lobby is knocked unconscious by the flying Rocketman.
keyEvents.significance: Removes a major defensive obstacle at the gates.

statusHistory.reason: Under assault by Straw Hat Pirates and allies

description: A prototype Sea Train designed by Tom's Workers that was deemed too dangerous for public use due to unreliable controls. Used by the Straw Hat Pirates and allies to travel from Water 7 to Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Orders to Keep Going
keyEvents.description: When faced with the gates, Zoro orders the crew to keep pushing forward, leading to the dramatic flight.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the spectacular Rocketman flight sequence.

keyEvents.title: The Rocketman Takes Flight
keyEvents.description: The Rocketman sea train becomes airborne, flying over the gates of Enies Lobby in a spectacular display.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most memorable visual moments of the arc, symbolizing unstoppable determination.

keyEvents.title: Rocketman Crashes into Oimo
keyEvents.description: The flying train crashes into Oimo's back, knocking the giant unconscious.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the devastating momentum of the rescue party's assault.

statusHistory.reason: In use during the assault on Enies Lobby

description: The main tower at Enies Lobby where CP9 operates and where the chief of CP9, Spandam, has his office. This is where prisoners are brought before being sent to Impel Down or executed.

keyEvents.title: Robin and Franky Brought Before Spandam
keyEvents.description: Nico Robin and Franky are presented to Spandam in the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: Critical moment showing Robin in the hands of the World Government leadership.

keyEvents.title: Franky Attacks Spandam
keyEvents.description: Franky directly attacks Spandam in his own office within the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Franky's defiance even while captured.
